mapper.sql: SELECT ck_sign_in.id,ck_sign_in.org_code,ck_sign_in.rec_source,ck_sign_in.rec_source_type,ck_sign_in.event_type,ck_sign_in.rec_time,ck_sign_in.user_no,dev_people.real_name AS real_name,dev_people.sex AS sex,dev_people.birth_date AS birth_date,date(rec_time) as date_date,time(rec_time) as date_time FROM ck_sign_in LEFT JOIN dev_people ON ck_sign_in.user_no = dev_people.user_no
